docs.lead_paragraph: A constitutional amendment facing voters in Mississippi would declare a fertilized human egg to be a legal person, effectively branding abortion and some forms of birth control as murder.

headline.main: Push for ‘Personhood’ Amendment Represents New Tack in Abortion Fight
headline.print_headline: Voters in Mississippi to Weigh Amendment on Conception as the Start of Life

docs.abstract: Constitutional amendment facing voters in Mississippi would declare a fertilized human egg to be a legal person, effectively branding abortion and some forms of birth control as murder.

docs.lead_paragraph: United Health/Oxford, the largest health insurer in New York, has reached an agreement over transparency in its filings for premium increases, putting pressure on other insurers to follow suit.

headline.seo: United Health/Oxford Stops Effort to Keep Rate-Increase Filings Secret
headline.main: Insurer Drops Fight to Keep Rate Filings From Public
headline.print_headline: Insurer Drops Fight to Keep Rate Filings From Public

docs.abstract: United Health/Oxford, the largest health insurer in New York State, agrees to drop a fight to keep its filings for rate increases secret, putting pressure on other insurance carriers to follow suit.
docs.snippet: United Health/Oxford, the largest health insurer in New York, has reached an agreement over transparency in its filings for premium increases, putting pressure on other insurers to follow suit.

docs.lead_paragraph: The selection of Ms. Rometty, a senior vice president at I.B.M., will make her one of the highest-profile women executives in corporate America.

headline.main: I.B.M. Names Virginia Rometty as New Chief Executive

docs.abstract: IBM names Virginia M Rometty, a senior vice president, as the company's next chief exeuctive; Rometty will succeed Samuel J Palmisano at the start of 2012.
docs.snippet: The selection of Ms. Rometty, a senior vice president at I.B.M., will make her one of the highest-profile women executives in corporate America.

docs.abstract: A Pew survey found that more Americans express support for the movement than express opposition, and the protests have prompted the Zuccotti Park Greenmarket to relocate.
docs.snippet: A Pew survey found that more Americans express support for the movement than express opposition, and the protests have prompted the Zuccotti Park Greenmarket to relocate.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Pew survey found that 39 percent of Americans support Occupy Wall Street, slightly higher than the number who oppose it, and that a higher number - 44 percent - oppose the Tea Party. [Pew Research Center]

docs.lead_paragraph: Many members of the middle class have to look after their disabled relatives themselves, or pay someone to do it.

headline.seo: With Class Act’s Failure, Still No Relief in Sight for Long-Term Care
headline.main: Still No Relief in Sight for Long-Term Needs
headline.print_headline: Still No Relief in Sight For Long-Term Needs

docs.abstract: News analysis; new health care law which would have given 50 dollars a day to help middle class families provide home care to disabled family members, and those suffering from dementia, dies quiet death in troubled political environment; law's failure leaves millions of such Americans to fend for their relatives themselves, an often crippling economic burden.
docs.snippet: Many members of the middle class have to look after their disabled relatives themselves, or pay someone to do it.

byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS and ROBERT PEAR

docs.lead_paragraph: Improvements in blood sugar control have resulted in an average increase of more than 15 years in life expectancy for people with Type 1 diabetes.

headline.seo: More Ways to Cope With Type 1 Diabetes and Low Blood Sugar
headline.main: More Ways to Cope With Type 1 Diabetes
headline.print_headline: More Ways to Cope With Type 1 Diabetes

docs.abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column notes improvements in blood sugar control have resulted in an average increase of more than 15 years in life expectancy for people with Type 1 diabetes.
